title: Prime Suspect: Earth
overview: A one-hour series that explores if natural phenomena could have played a role in mysterious historical events. Was the weather to blame for Napoleon Bonaparte's shocking defeat, a mystery blast that rocked a remote island, or a daredevil aviator's disappearance on a routine flight? For each story, a team of experts collect and analyze data, build a virtual crime scene, and step inside each scenario to crack the case.
